title: New Better Auth authentication integration
description: A new authentication provider for our Next.js starter kit with better defaults and more customization options.
content:
const{Fragment:e,jsx:t,jsxs:n}=arguments[0];function _createMdxContent(i){const r={a:"a",h2:"h2",li:"li",p:"p",ul:"ul",...i.components};return n(e,{children:[t(r.p,{children:"We're excited to announce a significant enhancement to our Next.js starter kit with the integration of Better Auth,
a robust authentication solution designed specifically for modern web applications.
This integration brings new authentication capabilities, like Passkeys, while maintaining the simplicity and developer experience you've come to expect from our starter kit."}),"
",t(r.h2,{id:"what-is-better-auth",children:t(r.a,{className:"subheading-anchor",href:"#what-is-better-auth",children:"What is Better Auth?"})}),"
",t(r.p,{children:"Better Auth is a comprehensive authentication solution that provides secure, scalable, and customizable authentication services. It handles everything from basic email/password authentication to more complex scenarios like social logins, multi-factor authentication (MFA), and enterprise SSO, all while maintaining top-tier security standards."}),"
",t(r.h2,{id:"key-features-of-the-integration",children:t(r.a,{className:"subheading-anchor",href:"#key-features-of-the-integration",children:"Key features of the integration"})}),"
",t(r.p,{children:"The integration provides a smooth authentication experience right out of the box:"}),"
",n(r.ul,{children:["
",t(r.li,{children:"New pre-built authentication pages, including password reset and email verification."}),"
",t(r.li,{children:"Social login support for popular providers (Google, GitHub, etc.)."}),"
",t(r.li,{children:"Email/password authentication."}),"
",t(r.li,{children:"Improved UX by showing the last used authentication method to the user."}),"
"]}),"
",t(r.h2,{id:"future-improvements",children:t(r.a,{className:"subheading-anchor",href:"#future-improvements",children:"Future improvements"})}),"
",n(r.ul,{children:["
",t(r.li,{children:"Passkeys"}),"
",t(r.li,{children:"Multi-factor authentication (MFA)"}),"
",t(r.li,{children:"Enterprise SSO"}),"
",t(r.li,{children:"Audit logs"}),"
"]}),"
",t(r.h2,{id:"conclusion",children:t(r.a,{className:"subheading-anchor",href:"#conclusion",children:"Conclusion"})}),"
",t(r.p,{children:"The integration of Better Auth into the Saas UI Next.js starter kit provides a robust, secure, and developer-friendly authentication solution.
It allows you to focus on building your application's unique features while having confidence in your authentication system."}),"
",t(r.p,{children:"For more detailed information, check out our documentation and the Better Auth API reference."}),"
",n(r.p,{children:["We're excited to see what you build with these new capabilities! Share your feedback and questions in our ",t(r.a,{href:"https://saas-ui.dev/discord",children:"community Discord server"}),"."]}),"
",t(r.h2,{id:"links",children:t(r.a,{className:"subheading-anchor",href:"#links",children:"Links"})}),"
",n(r.ul,{children:["
",t(r.li,{children:t(r.a,{href:"/docs/nextjs-starterkit/authentication/better-auth",children:"Documentation"})}),"
",t(r.li,{children:t(r.a,{href:"https://better-auth.com/",children:"Better Auth"})}),"
"]})]})}return{default:function(e={}){const{wrapper:n}=e.components||{};return n?t(n,{...e,children:t(_createMdxContent,{...e})}):_createMdxContent(e)}};

title: Building a Modern SaaS Dashboard with Saas UI and Next.js App Router
description: Dashboards are essential for every SaaS app, and UI libraries do help you build them fast. Let's look at how Saas UI can help.

In 2022, the market size was ",e(c.a,{href:"https://www.fortunebusinessinsights.com/software-as-a-service-saas-market-102222",children:"valued at USD 237.48 billion"}),". And it is expected to grow to USD 908.21 billion by 2030."]}),"
",e(c.p,{children:"For aspiring indie developers venturing into the realm of SaaS - regardless of your business niche - is the user-facing dashboard. This dashboard functions as a centralized nexus, orchestrating the monitoring, analysis, and visualization of data stemming from your application. There's just no substitute for a good administrative dashboard."}),"
",n(c.p,{children:["Building an efficient, responsive, and good-looking dashboard can take significant time. However, if you'd rather prioritize channeling your energy into product refinement rather than exhaustive UI/UX design, ",e(c.a,{href:"https://saas-ui.dev/",children:"Saas UI"})," can be a great addition to your UI kit for building smooth and beautiful dashboards. Saas UI provides a comprehensive set of design components, and combining it with a Next.js 14 application serves as a powerful foundation for any SaaS application."]}),"
",e(c.p,{children:n(c.a,{href:"https://saas-ui.dev/",children:[e(c.strong,{children:"Saas UI"}),": The React component library for Startups"]})}),"

",e(c.p,{children:"Saas UI is a React component library and a starter kit that helps you build intuitive SaaS products with speed. It provides accessible, themeable, and composable UI elements that look and feel great. It is based on Chakra and includes 40 essential elements that are open-sourced."}),"
",n(c.p,{children:["On the other hand, ",e(c.a,{href:"https://nextjs.org/",children:"Next.js"})," is a React framework that allows you to create full-stack web applications by extending the latest React features. It offers a powerful combination of server-side rendering, efficient client-side navigation, and a robust development ecosystem. The latest iteration - NextJS 14 - provides intuitive layouts and routing, improved SEO, and additional features like built-in font, image, script optimization, and, critically, React server components...with one cat"]}),"
",e(c.p,{children:"Combining the two can help you build high-performance, responsive, data-dense dashboards with speed."}),"
",e(c.p,{children:"Let's begin by creating a Next.js project and setting it up."}),"

title: Say hello to Saas UI
description: I'm proud to introduce you to Saas UI, an advanced component library built on top of Chakra UI.
content:
const{Fragment:e,jsx:t,jsxs:n}=arguments[0];function _createMdxContent(a){const o={a:"a",p:"p",...a.components};return n(e,{children:[t(o.p,{children:"I'm proud to introduce you to Saas UI, an advanced component library built on top of Chakra UI.
Over the years I've worked on countless web applications and SaaS products,
Saas UI is an accumilation of everything I've learned building these apps. It basically
is the frontend framework I've always wanted."}),"
",t(o.p,{children:"There hasn't been a better time to build web applications, the innovations that have come out
in recent years are incredible and allow us to be extremely productive. Saas UI's goal is to
leverage these techniques and create the ultimate development framework for startups."}),"
",n(o.p,{children:["Saas UI is still in development, but the first Open Source components have been released already.
Check out the ",t(o.a,{href:"/docs",children:"documentation"})," to see it in action and get a better idea about
what to expect next."]}),"
",n(o.p,{children:["In meantime we'd really appreciate if you star our ",t(o.a,{href:"https://github.com/saas-js/saas-ui",children:"Github repository"}),"."]})]})}return{default:function(e={}){const{wrapper:n}=e.components||{};return n?t(n,{...e,children:t(_createMdxContent,{...e})}):_createMdxContent(e)}};

The return value of the loader function is then inferred by the metadata, and component handlers."}),"

",n(c.p,{children:[e(c.a,{href:"/changelog#06-30-2023",children:"See the full changelog"}),"."]}),"
",e(c.h2,{id:"future-of-saas-ui",children:e(c.a,{className:"subheading-anchor",href:"#future-of-saas-ui",children:"Future of Saas UI"})}),"
",e(c.p,{children:"There is a lot of good stuff coming in the next 6 months, here's a little sneak peak of what to expect."}),"
",e(c.h3,{id:"new-components",children:e(c.a,{className:"subheading-anchor",href:"#new-components",children:"New components"})}),"
",e(c.p,{children:"We will be releasing more Pro components in the Open Source library in the next few months to give you more building blocks to build your applications."}),"
",e(c.h3,{id:"figma-design-system",children:e(c.a,{className:"subheading-anchor",href:"#figma-design-system",children:"Figma design system"})}),"
",n(c.p,{children:["After much request we are also working on a new Figma design system that will be released very soon, join our ",e(c.a,{href:"https://discord.gg/4PmJGFcAjX",children:"Discord"})," to get early access."]}),"
",e(c.h3,{id:"cross-framework-design-system",children:e(c.a,{className:"subheading-anchor",href:"#cross-framework-design-system",children:"Cross framework design system"})}),"
",n(c.p,{children:["There has been a big move away from CSS-in-JS in the last 6 months,
in big part due to the introduction of the Next.js app router and RSC (React Server Components).
This came with a lot of misconceptions and confusion about client side components (",e(c.code,{children:"use server"})," vs ",e(c.code,{children:"use client"}),") being bad and server components are the way forward.
The fact is you cannot build modern web applications without client side components, we believe there is a big role for SPAs applications.
Especially for the types of apps Saas UI is designed for, B2B applications, dashboards and internal tools that are not public facing and need to be highly interactive.
JSX with CSS-in-JS like APIs is still the best way to build these types of applications."]}),"
",e(c.p,{children:"Today you can already use Chakra UI and Saas UI with the Next.js app directory to build SPA style applications.
The app directory gives you a much better router with nested layouts and a much better developer experience for data fetching with server components.
While the app directory has been released as stable, it still comes with a lot of performance issues in development and we still recommend the pages router for now."}),"
",e(c.p,{children:"We will continue to work on the Chakra UI version of Saas UI, but have also started exploring to bring the Saas UI design system to other platforms.
With the releases of Mitosis, Zag.js, Ark and PandaCSS opening the door for maintainable cross framework component libraries, we are very excited about the future of Saas UI."}),"
",n(c.p,{children:["If you are interested in helping us build the future of Saas UI, join our ",e(c.a,{href:"https://discord.gg/4PmJGFcAjX",children:"Discord"}),"."]})]})}return{default:function(l={}){const{wrapper:n}=l.components||{};return n?e(n,{...l,children:e(_createMdxContent,{...l})}):_createMdxContent(l)}};
